description: This dashboard displays metrics collected by mq-metrics-pyclient

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_manager_status metric.
panels.title: MQ Manager Status

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_listener_status metric
panels.title: MQ Listeners Status

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_channel_status metric
panels.title: MQ Channels Status

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_msgs[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_msgs{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of sent or received messages

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_channel_lmsg metric.

targets.expr: max without(chsdata, chstati, jobname, conname) (mq_channel_lmsg{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN"}*1000) != 0

panels.title: Time of last sended message

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_buffers[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_buffers{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="buffers_received"} [5m])) != 0

sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_buffers{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="buffers_sent"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of transmission buffers

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_bytes[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_bytes{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="bytes_received"} [5m])) != 0

sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_bytes{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="bytes_sent"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of bytes

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_batches[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, conname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_batches{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel!~"(.*).SVRCONN"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of completed batches

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_msgs[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_msgs{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of sent or received messages

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_channel_lmsg metric.

targets.expr: max without(chsdata, chstati, jobname) (mq_channel_lmsg{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN"}*1000) != 0

panels.title: Time of last sended message

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_buffers[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_buffers{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="buffers_received"} [5m])) != 0
sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_buffers{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="buffers_sent"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of transmission buffers

panels.description: The panel shows the rate(mq_channel_bytes[5m]) metric.

targets.expr: sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_bytes{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="bytes_received"} [5m])) != 0
sum without(chstada, chstati, jobname, substate) (rate(mq_channel_bytes{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", channel=~"$channel", channel=~"(.*).SVRCONN", indicator="bytes_sent"} [5m])) != 0

panels.title: Per-second average rate of bytes

panels.description: The panel shows the utilization of application queues.

targets.expr: mq_queue_curdepth{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename !~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)"}/mq_queue_maxdepth{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename !~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)"}*100

panels.title: Application queues utilization

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_queue_curdepth metric
panels.title: Application queues current depth

panels.description: The panel shows real-time monitoring metrics for application queues.

targets.expr: sum(mq_queue_qtime{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename !~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)", indicator="short_term"}) by (qmname,instance,queuename)
sum(mq_queue_qtime{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename !~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)", indicator="long_term"}) by (qmname,instance,queuename)

panels.title: Application queues real-time monitoring metrics

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_queue_msgage metric. Only non empty queues.
panels.title: The oldest messages in application queues

panels.description: The panel shows idelta for mq_queue_qtime metric. Only queues with active operations.
panels.title: QTIME metric delta for application queues

panels.description: The panel shows the utilization of system queues.

targets.expr: mq_queue_curdepth{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename =~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)"}/mq_queue_maxdepth{qmname=~"$qmname", instance=~"$instance", queuename=~"$queuename", queuename =~"SYSTEM.(.*)|AMQ.MQEXPLORER.(.*)"}*100

panels.title: System queues utilization

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_queue_curdepth metric
panels.title: System queues current depth

panels.description: The panel shows real-time monitoring metrics for system queues.
panels.title: System queues real-time monitoring metrics

panels.description: The panel shows the mq_queue_msgage metric. Only non empty queues.
panels.title: The oldest messages in system queues

panels.description: The panel shows idelta for mq_queue_qtime metric. Only queues with active operations.
panels.title: QTIME metric delta for system queues

title: MQ Metrics Dashboard
